import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Actions/CheckIn" />

# Check-in Document Action
 
```jsx
const CheckInAction = (props) => withActionView({
	...props,
	title: "Check In Document",
	submitLabel: 'Check In',
	ViewForm: CheckInViewForm,
	viewLinkFn: (_, objLinks) => getLinkByRel(objLinks, 'view'),
}, () => null);
```
